thread.title: Florida Navy veteran beaten by young trio tortured turtle | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Florida Navy veteran beaten by young trio tortured turtle | Daily Mail Online

author: James Gordon For Dailymail.Com
title: Florida Navy veteran beaten by young trio tortured turtle | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Disabled Navy veteran is beaten by three young men and left with a black eye and a fractured skull as he stops them from torturing a TURTLE Daytona Beach Police arrested three men accused of beating up a disabled veteran who tried stopping them from torturing a turtle Gary Blough was in the driveway of his home when he found the men harming the reptile After telling them to leave it alone he tried to help the animal back to the water The men then attacked him leaving him with broken bones and a concussion Three men were arrested on charges of aggravated battery and animal cruelty The turtle died as a result of the attack Published: 19:12 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 20:26 GMT, 16 February 2017 154 shares
